# tsn: Time-Series Network Analysis

An R package for time series network analysis with a focus on distance calculation, network construction, and visualization.


## Installation

You can install the development version of tsn from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("santikka/tsn")
```
